mapper.select: SELECT F.FC_NAME, CASE WHEN INS_MF = 0 THEN '로스팅' ELSE '포장' END AS INS_MF, CASE WHEN ST = 0 THEN '가동' ELSE '비가동' END AS ST, N.NONOP_CD, N.NONOP_STT_TIME, N.NONOP_FN_TIME, N.FC_CHG, N.RSN, N.RSN_DESC, N.FC_CD FROM NONOP_MGMT N JOIN FC F ON N.FC_CD = F.FC_CD
select F.FC_NAME, F.INS_MF, F.ST, N.NONOP_CD, N.NONOP_STT_TIME, N.NONOP_FN_TIME, N.FC_CHG, N.RSN, N.RSN_DESC, N.FC_CD FROM NONOP_MGMT N JOIN FC F ON N.FC_CD = F.FC_CD where N.NONOP_CD = #{nonopCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE NONOP_MGMT SET NONOP_STT_TIME=#{nonopSttTime}, FC_CHG=#{fcChg}, RSN=#{rsn}, RSN_DESC=#{rsnDesc} WHERE NONOP_CD = #{nonopCd} and fc_cd=#{fcCd}
